body:
Well, the title explains it all.

Gone for 3 days :P

The weather right now is really bad :( 

Hope it clears up tomorrow.


The funny thing is right after I come back from camping, have a another one in 3 days :/

Its my first camping trip, and I'm looking forward to it! 

See you all in three days :D
